emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Predictive Maintenance
emerging_technologies.description: Use of AI to predict when equipment needs maintenance before failure occurs, reducing downtime and costs.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances efficiency, reduces environmental waste, and increases job roles in data analysis.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High initial costs offset by long-term savings, requires integration with existing systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Resistant Cryptography
emerging_technologies.description: Development of cryptographic systems that are secure against both classical and quantum computers.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Ensures long-term digital security, crucial for national and international data protection.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Global regulatory push for cybersecurity, investment in R&D from governments and tech giants.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Dust for Brain-Computer Interfaces
emerging_technologies.description: Ultra-small, wireless sensors that can be dispersed within the brain to monitor or stimulate neural activity.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for significant medical breakthroughs but raises privacy and ethical issues.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires medical approval, public acceptance of invasive technology, and robust data privacy laws.

emerging_technologies.name: Solar Roadways
emerging_technologies.description: Road surfaces that can generate electricity from solar panels embedded in the pavement.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Contributes to green energy solutions, but faces challenges in durability and efficiency.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Governmental support for renewable energy, technological advancements in solar cell efficiency.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Drone Delivery
emerging_technologies.description: Drones that navigate urban environments to deliver goods directly to consumers.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces road traffic, enhances delivery speed, but introduces noise and privacy concerns.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory frameworks for drone operations, consumer trust, and economic feasibility.

mainstream_technologies.name: 5G Networks
mainstream_technologies.description: Widespread deployment of 5G technology enhancing connectivity and IoT integration.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Nearly ubiquitous in urban areas, with rural expansion ongoing.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Chatbots
mainstream_technologies.description: Advanced chatbots capable of handling complex customer service interactions.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Standard in customer service sectors, with continuous improvements in natural language understanding.

epoch_themes.description: Integration of IoT, AI, and urban planning to create responsive and efficient city environments.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improves quality of life, reduces environmental impact, but requires significant initial investment.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increasing urban population driving demand for smart infrastructure.

epoch_themes.description: Heightened focus on protecting personal and corporate data from breaches and cyber threats.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Fosters trust in digital systems, but challenges in balancing security with user convenience.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Growing cyber threats and data breaches prompting stronger laws and tech solutions.

epoch_themes.description: Enhancing human capabilities through technology integration, from cognitive to physical enhancements.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential for increased productivity and health improvements, ethical considerations on human enhancement.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Advancements in biotech and AI fueling interest in human augmentation.
